zh-tw.username_rule: 帳號請輸入4-12個字元，僅可輸入小寫英文字母以及數字的組合
zh-tw.auto_unlock_instructions_1: 每小時：整點解鎖(ex：0點、1點…23點)
zh-tw.auto_unlock_instructions_4: 設定值於新鎖定帳號生效，舊帳號解鎖時間不異動
zh-tw.unlocked_alert: 已登入成功的帳號，不會顯示於列表中
zh-tw.lock_info_1: 密碼錯誤達【設定次數】帳號鎖定，請至【站台安全防護設置】操作
zh-tw.lock_info_2: 雙重驗證碼錯誤【5次】帳號鎖定
zh-tw.query_interval_cannot_exceed_30_days: 查詢區間不可超過 30 天
zh-tw.member_rule_character: 帳號只能包含英文小寫及數字
zh-tw.input_locked_reason_1: 會員帳號輸入錯誤，被鎖定的原因如下
zh-tw.input_locked_reason_3: 以「站台安全防護設置」功能的「雙重驗證」與「個資核實」同時是否開啟判斷
zh-tw.input_locked_reason_4: 有：「密碼錯誤次數」達 1000 次
zh-tw.input_locked_reason_5: 無：輸入錯誤，達「密碼錯誤次數」設定
zh-tw.input_locked_reason_7: 會員「申請取款」或「修改取款密碼」， 30 分鐘內原取款密碼輸入錯誤達 5 次
zh-tw.input_locked_reason_9: 輸入錯誤「雙重驗證碼」，達 500 次
zh-tw.inactive_locked_reason: 長期未登入：會員登入時間間隔，超過「站台安全防護設置」功能的「長期未登入」設定
zh-tw.account_lock_info_1:
欲修改以下鎖定條件，請至 {message}功能：
密碼錯誤：設定「密碼錯誤次數」
長期未登入：設定「長期未登入」
zh-tw.account_lock_info_2: 輸入錯誤：已登入成功的帳號，不會顯示於「輸入錯誤」已解鎖列表中
zh-tw.account_lock_info_3: 長期未登入：會員解鎖後並登入後，開始重新計算是否達到長期未登入條件，若會員解鎖後沒有登入，會員就會維持在解鎖狀態
zh-tw.account_lock_info_4: IPv6進行查詢教學，請查看 {message}
zh-tw.account_lock_info_5: 因鎖定中、已解鎖數量僅過濾廳主、帳號、IP位置；當與實際顯示筆數不同時，可調整表格上方搜尋條件來查看更多資料
zh-tw.auto_unlock_instructions_5: 自動解鎖僅針對「輸入錯誤」解鎖，不包含長期未登入
zh-tw.input_locked_reason_10: 輸入錯誤「短信驗證碼」，達20次

zh-cn.username_rule: 帐号请输入4-12个字元，仅可输入小写英文字母以及数字的组合
zh-cn.auto_unlock_instructions_1: 每小时：整点解锁（例如：0点，1点... 23点）
zh-cn.auto_unlock_instructions_4: 设定值于新锁定帐号生效，旧帐号解锁时间不异动
zh-cn.unlocked_alert: 已登入成功的帐号，不会显示于列表中
zh-cn.lock_info_1: 密码错误达【设定次数】帐号锁定，请至【站台安全防护设置】操作
zh-cn.lock_info_2: 雙重驗證碼錯誤【5次】帳號鎖定
zh-cn.query_interval_cannot_exceed_30_days: 查询区间不可超过 30 天
zh-cn.member_rule_character: 帐号只能包含英文小写及数字
zh-cn.input_locked_reason_1: 会员帐号输入错误，被锁定的原因如下
zh-cn.input_locked_reason_3: 以「站台安全防护设置」功能的「双重验证」与「个资核实」同时是否开启判断
zh-cn.input_locked_reason_4: 有：「密码错误次数」达 1000 次
zh-cn.input_locked_reason_5: 无：输入错误，达「密码错误次数」设定
zh-cn.input_locked_reason_7: 会员「申请取款」或「修改取款密码」， 30 分钟内原取款密码输入错误达 5 次
zh-cn.input_locked_reason_9: 输入错误「双重验证码」，达 500 次
zh-cn.inactive_locked_reason: 长期未登入：会员登入时间间隔，超过「站台安全防护设置」功能的「长期未登入」设定
zh-cn.account_lock_info_1:
欲修改以下锁定条件，请至 {message}功能：
密码错误：设定「密码错误次数」
长期未登入：设定「长期未登入」
zh-cn.account_lock_info_2: 输入错误：已登入成功的帐号，不会显示于「输入错误」已解锁列表中
zh-cn.account_lock_info_3: 长期未登入：会员解锁后并登入后，开始重新计算是否达到长期未登入条件，若会员解锁后没有登入，会员就会维持在解锁状态
zh-cn.account_lock_info_4: IPv6进行查询教学，请查看 {message}
zh-cn.account_lock_info_5: 因锁定中、已解锁数量仅过滤厅主、帐号、IP位置；当与实际显示笔数不同时，可调整表格上方搜寻条件来查看更多资料
zh-cn.auto_unlock_instructions_5: 自动解锁仅针对「输入错误」解锁，不包含长期未登入
zh-cn.input_locked_reason_10: 输入错误「短信验证码」，达20次

en.regexp_of_ip: Does not conform to IP format.
en.username_rule: Please input username at least 4-12 characters, with only lower cases and numeric combinations
en.auto_unlock_instructions_1: Every hour: unlock on the hour (ex: 00:00, 1:00…23:00)
en.auto_unlock_instructions_4: The account which is locked after setting will be affected.    The account which was locked before setting is not affected.
en.date_limit_30: The search date can not be greater than 30 days.
en.unlock_this_member: Be sure to unlock this member
en.unlock_these_member: Be sure to unlock these members
en.unlocked_alert: These log-in-successfully IDs are not able to show in the list.
en.lock_info_1: Password error reaches “the set times”. Account is locked. Please go to “Website Security Settings”.
en.lock_info_2: Enter incorrect 2-step verification for “5 times”. Account is locked.
en.member_rule_character: Account only allows English small letters and numbers.
en.long_time_no_sign_in: Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time
en.input_locked_reason_1: When member’s account has an input error, the lock reasons are as follows:
en.input_locked_reason_3: Whether both functions of “2-Step Verification” and “Identity Verification” in the “Website Security Settings” are turned on to determine.
en.input_locked_reason_4: Yes: “Number of Incorrect Password Inputs” reaches 1000 times.
en.input_locked_reason_5: No: Input error reaches the “Number of Incorrect Password Inputs”.
en.input_locked_reason_7: When “Apply for Withdrawal” or “Change Withdrawal Password”, the original withdrawal password is entered incorrectly 5 times within 30 minutes.
en.input_locked_reason_9: Enter the incorrect “2-Step Verification Code” up to 500 times.
en.inactive_locked_reason: Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time: The member login time interval exceeds the “Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time” setting of the “Website Security Settings” function.
en.account_lock_info_1:
If you want to change the below locked conditions, please go to {message}：
Incorrect Password: Set “Number of Incorrect Password Inputs”
Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time: Set “Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time”
en.account_lock_info_2: Input Error: Accounts that have be logged in successfully won’t be displayed in the “Input Error” unlocked list.
en.account_lock_info_3: Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time: After unlock the member and log in, start to recalculate whether it meets the condition of Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time. if unlock the member doesn’t log in after unlocking, the member will maintain the unlocked status.
en.account_lock_info_4: How to search by IPv6. Please see {message}.
en.account_lock_info_5: The number of locking and unlocked accounts is only filtered by the owner, account and IP address. When it is different from the actual number, you can change the search conditions for more information.
en.auto_unlock_instructions_5: Auto Unlock is only for “Input Error”, not including “Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time”.
en.input_locked_reason_10: 输入错误「短信验证码」，达20次

ja.please_enter_datetime: 時間を選んでください
ja.regexp_of_ip: Does not conform to IP format.
ja.select_hall: ホールを選んで下さい
ja.username_rule: Please input username at least 4-12 characters, with only lower cases and numeric combinations
ja.account_lock_monitor: アカウントロック管理
ja.auto_unlock_instructions_1: 毎正時：正時アンロック（ex:一時ちょうど、二時ちょうどなど）
ja.auto_unlock_instructions_3: 毎日：アメリカ東部標準時0時アンロック
ja.auto_unlock_instructions_4: 設定値は新ロックに適用される すでにロックされたアカウントに影響なし
ja.date_limit_30: The search date can not be greater than 30 days.
ja.batch_unlock: バッチアンロック処理
ja.unlock_this_member: Be sure to unlock this member
ja.unlock_these_member: Be sure to unlock these members
ja.unlocked_alert: These log-in-successfully IDs are not able to show in the list.
ja.select_domain: ホールを選んで下さい
ja.lock_info_1: パスワードの連続失敗が【指定の回数】を超えるとロックされる機能は、【サイトセキュリティの設定】にて設定できます。
ja.lock_info_2: 2段階認証を【五回】ミスしたらアカウントがロックされます。
ja.please_select_time: 時間を選んでください
ja.member_rule_character: Account only allows English small letters and numbers.
ja.long_time_no_sign_in: Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time
ja.input_locked_reason_1: When member’s account has an input error, the lock reasons are as follows:
ja.input_locked_reason_3: Whether both functions of “2-Step Verification” and “Identity Verification” in the “Website Security Settings” are turned on to determine.
ja.input_locked_reason_4: Yes: “Number of Incorrect Password Inputs” reaches 1000 times.
ja.input_locked_reason_5: No: Input error reaches the “Number of Incorrect Password Inputs”.
ja.input_locked_reason_7: When “Apply for Withdrawal” or “Change Withdrawal Password”, the original withdrawal password is entered incorrectly 5 times within 30 minutes.
ja.input_locked_reason_9: Enter the incorrect “2-Step Verification Code” up to 500 times.
ja.inactive_locked_reason: Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time: The member login time interval exceeds the “Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time” setting of the “Website Security Settings” function.
ja.account_lock_info_1:
If you want to change the below locked conditions, please go to {message}：
Incorrect Password: Set “Number of Incorrect Password Inputs”
Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time: Set “Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time”
ja.account_lock_info_2: Input Error: Accounts that have be logged in successfully won’t be displayed in the “Input Error” unlocked list.
ja.account_lock_info_3: Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time: After unlock the member and log in, start to recalculate whether it meets the condition of Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time. if unlock the member doesn’t log in after unlocking, the member will maintain the unlocked status.
ja.account_lock_info_4: How to search by IPv6. Please see {message}.
ja.account_lock_info_5: The number of locking and unlocked accounts is only filtered by the owner, account and IP address. When it is different from the actual number, you can change the search conditions for more information.
ja.auto_unlock_instructions_5: Auto Unlock is only for “Input Error”, not including “Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time”.
ja.input_locked_reason_10: 输入错误「短信验证码」，达20次

ko.regexp_of_ip: Does not conform to IP format.
ko.username_rule: Please input username at least 4-12 characters, with only lower cases and numeric combinations
ko.auto_unlock_instructions_4: 해당 설정은 새로운 잠금계정에만 적용되며 기존계정의 해제시간은 변동되지 않음.
ko.date_limit_30: The search date can not be greater than 30 days.
ko.unlock_this_member: Be sure to unlock this member
ko.unlock_these_member: Be sure to unlock these members
ko.unlocked_alert: These log-in-successfully IDs are not able to show in the list.
ko.lock_info_1: 비밀번호 오류가【설정된 횟수】에 달할 시 계정이 잠금되며【사이트 안전 보호 설치】에서 설정하시기 바랍니다.
ko.member_rule_character: 계정명은 영문 소문자 및 숫자만 가능함.
ko.input_locked_reason_1: 회원계정에 입력 오류를 발생하여 잠김된 원인은 아래와 같다:
ko.input_locked_reason_3: 「사이트 안정보호 장치」기능인 「이중인증」및「개인정보 심사」는 동시에 켜질지 판단한다.
ko.input_locked_reason_7: 회원가「출금 신청」혹은「출금 비밀번호 수정」에 30분 내에 기존 출금 비밀번호를 5번까지 틀리게 입력한다.
ko.inactive_locked_reason: 장기간 미동록 : 회원은 로그인의 간격이 「사이트 안정보호 장치」기능인 「장기간 미동록」 설정을 넘어가다.
ko.account_lock_info_1:
아래의 잠긴 조건을 수정하려면 {message} 기능로 하세요:
비밀번호 틀림 : 「비밀번호 틀림 횟수」로 설정
장기간 미등록 : 「장기간 미등록」로 설정
ko.account_lock_info_2: 입력 오류 : 로그인된 계정을 사용하여 「입력 오류」잠김 해제의 목록에 표시하지 않는다.
ko.account_lock_info_3: 장기간 미등록 : 회원는 잠김해제하고 로그인 후에 장기간 미등록의 조건에 달성할지 다시 정산을 시작하며 회원는 잠김해제하고 로그인하지 않는 경우 잠김해제의 상태로 유지한다.
ko.account_lock_info_4: IPv6로 튜토리얼을 조회하며 {message} 확인해 주세요.
ko.account_lock_info_5: 잠김 중、해제된 수량은 홀오너、계정、IP위치에만 거르기 때문에 실제 표시한 건수와 다르는 경우에 표의 상단에 있는 검색조건을 조절해서 더 많은 자료를 조회할 수 있다.
ko.input_locked_reason_10: 输入错误「短信验证码」，达20次

vi.must_not_null: Ô này không được để trống
vi.regexp_of_ip: Does not conform to IP format.
vi.search_total: Số đơn vị được tìm kiếm
vi.username_rule: Please input username at least 4-12 characters, with only lower cases and numeric combinations
vi.account_lock_monitor: Giám sát tài khoản bị khóa
vi.auto_unlock_instructions: Hướng dẫn tự động mở khóa
vi.auto_unlock_instructions_1: Mỗi giờ : đúng giờ mở khóa (ex: 0 giờ, 1 giờ …..23 giờ)
vi.auto_unlock_instructions_2: Mỗi 12 giờ : 00 giờ, 12 giờ mở khóa
vi.auto_unlock_instructions_3: Mỗi ngày : 00 giờ E.S.T mở khóa
vi.auto_unlock_instructions_4: Giá trị cài đặt có hiệu lực với tài khoản bị khóa mới Không thay đổi thời gian mở khóa của tài khoản cũ
vi.date_limit_30: The search date can not be greater than 30 days.
vi.locks_total: Tổng số đơn vị bị khóa
vi.unlock_this_member: Be sure to unlock this member
vi.unlock_these_member: Be sure to unlock these members
vi.unlocked_alert: These log-in-successfully IDs are not able to show in the list.
vi.lock_info_1: Sai mật khẩu đạt đến 【số lần cài đặt】  tài khoản bị khóa lại, xin vào【hệ thống cài  đặt phòng hộ an toàn】để thao tác.
vi.lock_info_2: Saimật khẩu nghiệm chứng song đôi【5 lần】tài khoản bị khóa
vi.wrong_two_factor_auth: Sai mật khẩu nghiệm chứng song đôi
vi.how_to_use_ipv6: Làm sao để sử dụng IPv6?
vi.last_login_time: Thời gian đăng nhập lần cuối
vi.member_rule_character: Tài khoản chỉ có thể gồm ký tự chữ thường và số
vi.long_time_no_sign_in: Không đăng nhập thời gian dài
vi.input_error_auto_unlock: Nhập sai thông tin tự động mở khóa
vi.input_locked_reason_1: Hội viên nhập sai thông tin，tài khoản bị khóa bởi nguyên nhân dưới đây：
vi.input_locked_reason_3: Kiểm tra chức năng「Xác thực kép」và「Xác minh thông tin cá nhân」tại mục「Thiết lập bảo mật trang mạng」có được bật cùng lúc hay không
vi.input_locked_reason_4: CÓ：「Số lần nhập sai mật khẩu」Tới 1000 lần
vi.input_locked_reason_5: KHÔNG：Nhập sai thông tin，đạt tới「Số lần sai mật khẩu」đã thiết lập
vi.input_locked_reason_7: Hội viên「Gửi yêu cầu rút tiền」hoặc「Thay đổi mật khẩu rút tiền」， trong vòng 30 phút nhập sai mật khẩu rút tiền tới 5 lần
vi.input_locked_reason_9: Nhập sai「Mã xác thực kép」，tới 500 lần
vi.inactive_locked_reason: Không đăng nhập thời gian dài: Khoảng cách thời gian đăng nhập của hội viên vượt quá thời gian đã thiết lập tại chức năng 「Không đăng nhập thời gian dài」tại 「Thiết lập bảo mật trang mạng」
vi.account_lock_info_1:
Muốn thay đổi những điều kiện khóa dưới đây, Vui lòng chuyển đến chức năng {message}：
Sai mật khẩu: Thiết lập 「Số lần sai mật khẩu」
Không đăng nhập thời gian dài: Thiết lập 「Không đăng nhập thời gian dài」
vi.account_lock_info_2: Nhập sai thông tin: Tài khoản đã đăng nhập thành công sẽ không hiển thị 「Nhập sai thông tin」trong danh sách đã mở khóa
vi.account_lock_info_3: Không đăng nhập thời gian dài: Hội viên sau khi mở khóa và đăng nhập sẽ bắt đầu tính lại điều kiện không đăng nhập thời gian dài. Nếu hội viên sau khi mở khóa nhưng không đăng nhập, tài khoản hội viên sẽ giư ở trạng thái đang mở khóa
vi.account_lock_info_4: IPv6 tiến hành dướng dẫn, Vui lòng kiểm tra {message}
vi.account_lock_info_5: Vì khi khóa tài khoản, số lần mở khỏa chỉ lọc Sảnh chính, tài khoản, địa chỉ IP; Khi số lần mở khác với số lần thực tế hiển thị, có thể thay đổi điều kiện tiệm tìm kiếm phía trên bảng để có thể xem được nhiều dữ liệu hơn
vi.auto_unlock_instructions_5: Tự động mở khóa chỉ có tác dụng mở khóa「Nhập sai thông tin」，không bao gồm「Không đăng nhập thời gian dài」
vi.input_locked_reason_10: 输入错误「短信验证码」，达20次

th.auto_unlock_instructions: คำอธิบายการปลดล็อคอัตโนมัติ
th.auto_unlock_instructions_1: ทุกชั่วโมง: ปลดล็อคทุกชั่วโมง (เช่น: 00:00, 1:00…23:00)
th.auto_unlock_instructions_2: ทุก 12 ชั่วโมง: ปลดล็อคเวลา 00:00 และ 12:00
th.auto_unlock_instructions_3: ทุกวัน: ปลดล็อคเวลา 00:00 (เวลาอเมริกาตะวันออก)
th.auto_unlock_instructions_4: จะส่งผลต่อบัญชีที่ถูกล็อคหลังตั้งค่า   ไม่ส่งผลต่อบัญชีที่ล็อคก่อนตั้งค่า

th.date_limit_30: The search date can not be greater than 30 days.
th.batch_unlock: ปลดล็อคทีละล็อต
th.locks_total: จำนวนล็อครวม
th.unlock_this_member: Be sure to unlock this member
th.unlock_these_member: Be sure to unlock these members
th.minute_update: รีเฟรช{minute}นาที

th.end_time: เวลาสิ้นสุด
th.string_over: จำกัดตัวอักษรที่{num}ตัว
th.domain_sub_account: ข้อมูลลูกทีม
th.not_required: ไม่จำเป็นต้องกรอก
th.unlocked_alert: These log-in-successfully IDs are not able to show in the list.
th.select_domain: โปรดเลือกระดับผู้ควบคุม
th.lock_info_1: รหัสผ่านผิดพลาดเกิน【จำนวนครั้งที่กำหนด】บัญชีถูกล็อก กรุณาเข้าไปตั้งค่าที่【อุปกรณ์ป้องกันความปลอดภัยของสถานี】
th.lock_info_2: รหัสผ่านสองขั้นผิดพลาด【5ครั้ง】บัญชีถูกล็อก
th.wrong_two_factor_auth: รหัสผ่านสองขั้นผิดพลาด
th.please_select_time: กรุณาเลือกเวลา
th.dispensing_method: วิธีชำระเงิน
th.top_management: ผู้บริหารสูงสุด
th.last_login_time: เวลาล็อคอินล่าสุด
th.member_rule_character: Account only allows English small letters and numbers.
th.long_time_no_sign_in: Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time
th.input_locked_reason_1: When member’s account has an input error, the lock reasons are as follows:
th.input_locked_reason_3: Whether both functions of “2-Step Verification” and “Identity Verification” in the “Website Security Settings” are turned on to determine.
th.input_locked_reason_4: Yes: “Number of Incorrect Password Inputs” reaches 1000 times.
th.input_locked_reason_5: No: Input error reaches the “Number of Incorrect Password Inputs”.
th.input_locked_reason_7: When “Apply for Withdrawal” or “Change Withdrawal Password”, the original withdrawal password is entered incorrectly 5 times within 30 minutes.
th.input_locked_reason_9: Enter the incorrect “2-Step Verification Code” up to 500 times.
th.inactive_locked_reason: Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time: The member login time interval exceeds the “Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time” setting of the “Website Security Settings” function.
th.account_lock_info_1:
If you want to change the below locked conditions, please go to {message}：
Incorrect Password: Set “Number of Incorrect Password Inputs”
Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time: Set “Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time”
th.account_lock_info_2: Input Error: Accounts that have be logged in successfully won’t be displayed in the “Input Error” unlocked list.
th.account_lock_info_3: Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time: After unlock the member and log in, start to recalculate whether it meets the condition of Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time. if unlock the member doesn’t log in after unlocking, the member will maintain the unlocked status.
th.account_lock_info_4: How to search by IPv6. Please see {message}.
th.account_lock_info_5: The number of locking and unlocked accounts is only filtered by the owner, account and IP address. When it is different from the actual number, you can change the search conditions for more information.
th.auto_unlock_instructions_5: Auto Unlock is only for “Input Error”, not including “Haven’t Logged In for A Long Time”.
th.input_locked_reason_10: 输入错误「短信验证码」，达20次
